The Opportunity: Work term of 4 months starting in May 2025 How You Will Contribute: We design, implement, and maintain real-time embedded platform and application software for several of Ciena's flagship products. Functional areas in our scope range from low level bit flipping drivers to high level software state machines for interfacing with external applications: • Linux and VxWorks kernels and base software components • Configuration Management and Sofware Upgrade Management for Ciena 6500 and RLS platforms • Hardware/software interface to provide bridging of various abstraction layers. • Fault and alarms subsystems to detect, report and maintain defects and manage their hysteresis and co-relations. • System applications such as traffic/equipment protection, performance monitoring, etc. • Software Development Kits that abstract the underlying low-level software and hardware to facility platform application developments and integration.
